title: Construction Thresh Skin Idea
body: Builder themed. Hard hat, Hi-vis vest, the works. His hook is a crane hook, his lantern his toolbox/lunchbox. Souls can be screws, sandwiches, whatever floats the boat. His ult could be changed to wooden barricades that once get broken splinter to pieces.

replies.body: this sounds like a freaking awesome idea! we need more fun skins in the game like this, i love skins that have a jovial aspect to them.

I swear I had a dream about Thresh wearing a hard hat.

Dear god.
